Topic.Title: Starting with a object in inventory

Posts.EditableText: I'm sorry for this silly question, but what i do to my player starts with something in it's inventory instead of picking it up?
Posts.HTML: I'm sorry for this silly question, but what i do to my player starts with something in it's inventory instead of picking it up?

Posts.EditableText: In the Quest editor, drag and drop the object onto the player (make it a child of/contained in the player).
Posts.HTML: In the Quest editor, drag and drop the object onto the player (make it a child of/contained in the player).
